title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems. I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame).
OB: When launching the Help view, the tab key does not do anything.
EB: The Help view should be designed to allow immediate navigation via the keyboard.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Launch the Help view on Win2K operating system. 2. Press the tab key and observe that it does not have any effect.
